casebody.data:
SCRIPTO MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Appellant, v. EAGLE PENCIL COMPANY, Appellee. No. 150. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 9, 1935. Ralph E. Slayton, of New York City, for appellant. Morris Hirsch and Dean, Fairbank, Hirsch & Foster, all of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (13 F.Supp. 71) affirmed on opinion below.
